original_text: For the Son of God, Jesus Christ, who was preached among you by us, even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus, was not yea and nay, but in him was yea.
korean_text: 우리 곧 나와 실루아노와 디모데로 말미암아 너희 가운데 전파된 하나님의 아들 예수 그리스도는 예 하고 아니라 함이 되지 아니하셨으니 그에게는 예만 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: For the Son of God, Jesus Christ,
who was preached among you by us,
even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus,
